import React, { useState } from 'react' import './Login.scss' import LoginIntro from '../../assests/images/LoginIntro.png' import GoogleLogo from '../../assests/images/GoogleLogo.png' import LogoBrand from '../../assests/images/Logo_Brand.png' import Logo from '../../assests/images/Logo.png' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' import { Alert } from 'bootstrap' function Login() { const [userName, setUserName] = useState(''); const [password, setPassword] = useState(''); const [showError, setShowError] = useState(false); const handleClick = () => { if (!userName || !password) { setShowError(true); } else { setShowError(false); } console.log("User name: ", userName, "Password: ", password); } return ( <>
{showError && (
